Uses of Class
org.springframework.http.RequestEntity

  • Packages that use RequestEntity 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.http
    Contains a basic abstraction over client/server-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.web.client
    Core package of the client-side web support.

    • Uses of RequestEntity in org.springframework.http

      Subclasses of RequestEntity in org.springframework.http 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RequestEntity.UriTemplateRequestEntity<T>
      RequestEntity initialized with a URI template and variables instead of a URI.
      Methods in org.springframework.http that return RequestEntity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> RequestEntity<T> RequestEntity.BodyBuilder.body(T body)
      Set the body of the request entity and build the RequestEntity.
      <T> RequestEntity<T> RequestEntity.BodyBuilder.body(T body, Type type)
      Set the body and type of the request entity and build the RequestEntity.
      RequestEntity<Void> RequestEntity.HeadersBuilder.build()
      Builds the request entity with no body.
